(I wish i was a dog) AND I WONT EVEN BE ABLE TO RUN! Because they put trackers in everything in order to successfully do trumps nasty deeds. attributes.review: I downloaded the app and suddenly my family started supporting a white supremacy group. It was strange. Then they started saying that masks donâ€™t work and we shouldnâ€™t wear them. At first I didnâ€™t realize the things were related but then I talked to my neighbors and they had similar experiences. They said when they deleted the app everything went back to normal. I went home and my daughter said she was ready to go back to school cause Trump said itâ€™s ok. She then explained if we stop testing the numbers will drop. I had to explain thatâ€™s not how science works. If you just ignore something it doesnâ€™t go away. Ugh canâ€™t wait to delete the app and see my smart family again. I canâ€™t deal with the confederate flag and swastikas they are sporting. As a side note it also took away my right to have my birth control covered under insurance even though I have endometriosis so I do need it but viagra is still covered. I guess we know what that means.
